title: Ticket #3661: standard-universe port for Debian 7
description:
Creating a ticket just to track status and ensure this appears in the list of LIGO issues.

Our deadline is a few months before Debian 6 ("squeeze") is EOL'ed, so that we have time to port, test and deploy our code before updates cease. So we probably need something by winter 2013, -ish.
remarks:
2013-Jul-01 15:10:13 by tannenba:
Abandoning this ticket as it is a dup of #3665
creator: pfc
